scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send: INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 X-DolbyVoice-Client-LogId: JustInviteSDPLess-amrwb.xml X-DolbyVoice-MediaServer-MultiCodec: 0 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 121 a=rtpmap:121 AMR-WB/16000/1 a=fmtp:121 octet-align=0;mode-change-period=1;mode-change-capability=2;mode-change-neighbor=0;max-red=999;crc=1;robust-sorting=1
